title: Marathi actress Ketaki Chitale sent to police custody for sharing derogatory post against NCP chief Sharad Pawar - Times of India
content:
1. Marathi actress Ketaki Chitale sent to police custody for sharing derogatory post against NCP chief Sharad Pawar  Times of India
  2. On Camera, BJP Leader Slapped For Post Against Sharad Pawar  NDTV
  3. The angry young brigade of Sharad ‘Mr Congeniality’ Pawar  The Indian Express
  4. How a poem on Brahminism sparked political furore in Maharashtra  Hindustan Times
  5. Cops Take Actor To Her Home, Seize Electronics In Sharad Pawar Post Case  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Marathi actress Ketaki Chitale has landed in legal trouble for allegedly sharing a derogatory post on her Facebook account against Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) chief Sharad Pawar. Now a Thane court has sent the actress to police custody till May 18. Reportedly the actress has been charged under sections 153A, 500, 501 and 504, 506 and 34 of IPC at Bhoiwada police station in Mumbai. Not just this, on May 14 some NCP activists and the followers of Sharad Pawar threw black ink and eggs on her while she was being taken into custody by police. For more news and updates, stay tuned to ETimes
